name: Artista - Buffalo Ten Maduro San Andres - Box Pressed Toro
brand: Artista, Buffalo Ten Maduro San Andres
additionalNotes: They say money isn’t everything and they are right; this blend is priced so low you will question how we even make any money. The answer is: they make cigars, not money. Buffalo TEN is a study in the art of cigar making with three distinct blends to smoke. Maduro taste a lots of rich Dominican cacao, hints of sweet exotic spice and tangy dried fruit.
